data.title: Majin Buu Enemies
data.meta_description: One of Dragon Ball Z's most ferocious and transformation-happy of characters, Majin Buu is the last major enemy in the Dragon Ball Z storyline. With the ability to absorb foes, learn moves, and deliver a serious punch, Majin Buu is one of Goku and friends' most challenging of enemies.
data.text:
Android 18

Twin sister of Android 17, the only female "Android" (actually a Cyborg in this case) created by Dr. Gero. 18 is absorbed by Cell to transform into his Perfect Form, but is later spat back out. She marries Krillin and they have a daughter, Marron.

Bulma

A beautiful and highly intelligent scientist and part of the wealthiest family in the world. She is the daughter of Dr. Brief, the founder of the Capsule Corporation. She meets Goku while searching for the Dragon Balls, and eventually marries Vegeta and has two children.

Chi-Chi

Goku's Wife in the Dragon Ball Series. She can be very overprotective of her children. She often worries when they go off to fight.

Dende

Saved from Dodoria by Krillin and Gohan, Dende later has healing powers unlocked, which can cure the wounded like a senzu bean. Later, Dende becomes the guardian of Earth, replacing Kami.

Future Trunks

Trunks as he is first seen in Dragon Ball Z. He comes from the future to warn the Z fighters about the androids. Due to his harsh upbringing he is far different than the standard timeline variant.

Gohan

Gohan is Goku's son and one of the heroes in the Dragon Ball Z universe. He is also the protagonist of the Cell Saga, where he is the first to reach the Super Saiyan 2 form, through immense anger and emotion. In his later Ultimate form, he is considered the most powerful warrior in Dragon Ball Z. He is Goten's older brother and the father of Pan. His wife is Videl and his grandfathers are Ox-king and Bardock, respectively.

Goku

Goku is the main protagonist in the Dragon Ball franchise and one of the strongest fighters in the universe. He is a Saiyan warrior whose original name was Kakarot, son of Bardock. He is the husband of Chi Chi, and the father of Gohan and Goten. He is also Grandfather to Pan.

Good Buu

Despite looking pink and childish Good Buu is one of the most powerful fighters in Dragon Ball. This is the good entity separated from his evil self.

Goten

The second son of Goku and Chichi, younger brother of Gohan. Goten achieved the Super Saiyan transformation at just 7 years old, making him the youngest Super Saiyan ever.

Grand Supreme Kai

Grand Supreme Kai was the highest-ranking deity in the DragonBall universe, until he was absorbed by Majin Buu. Being absorbed by Buu gave the monster his signature stout appearance and capacity to do good.

Krillin

Krillin holds the honor of being one of the most often killed characters in the Dragon Ball Z universe. After the cell games, Krillin grows hair and marries Android 18 and has a daughter with her named Marron.

Master Roshi

Known as 'Mutenroushi' (武天老師) in the original Japanese, Master Roshi is one of the most influential characters in all of the DBZ legend, he has raised and motivated many of the youth that would later become the universe's greatest warriors.

Oolong

One of the oldest characters in the Dragon Ball universe, Oolong is a talking pig that can transform into any from he wishes.

Piccolo

Piccolo is a character in the Dragon Ball universe who was originally portrayed as a villain but later became one of Earth's heroes.

Pikkon

Pikkon is a dead warrior from the Western quadrant of the galaxy. He faces off against Goku in a tournament held in the afterlife. Due to the green skin, he can be compared with a namek. He is a filler character as such is not seen in the manga.

Shenron

Shenron was made by Kami, the guardian of the earth, to grant the wish of whoever gathered the 7 dragon balls.
